title:
KYBO 3.0.0
***Thriller***
The Loft (2014) http://180upload.com/m2ebz0rqnxsp http://www.film4eg.com/wp-content/uploads/Loft-final-poster-1.jpg http://www.screendaily.com/pictures/636xAny/4/3/3/1123433_IMG_4274.jpg Five married guys conspire to secretly share a penthouse loft in the city--a place where they can carry out hidden affairs and indulge in their deepest fantasies. But the fantasy becomes a nightmare when they discover the dead body of an unknown woman in the loft, and they realize one of the group must be involved.
Hangar 10 (2014) http://180upload.com/bfkct3hndr3f http://ia.media-imdb.com/images/M/MV5BMTY1NTE2NjM2NV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMzA4NjkzMzE@._V1_SX500_SY999_.jpg? http://www.chud.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/11/hangar-10-poster-banner.jpg 33 years after the infamous Rendlesham Forest UFO incident, three metal detector enthusiasts hunting for Saxon gold in the same region, capture incredible footage of UFO's whilst filming their expedition. As night falls and with their navigation equipment failing, they find themselves facing a terrifying encounter with an unforgiving alien presence.
Life After Beth (2014) http://180upload.com/nwhizj2888eo http://ia.media-imdb.com/images/M/MV5BMjA3OTUwOTMxOF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwODg4NTkwMjE@._V1_SX500_SY999_.jpg? http://iwatchstuff.com/2014/06/26/life-after-beth-trailer.jpg A young man's recently deceased girlfriend mysteriously returns from the dead, but he slowly realizes she is not the way he remembered her.
Out of the Dark (2014) http://180upload.com/t173lt1rm3iq http://ia.media-imdb.com/images/M/MV5BMzY5MDE1ODE2N15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMDY5NTc5MzE@._V1_SX500_SY999_.jpg? http://extraimago.com/images/2015/01/13/22469e.png A couple and their daughter moves to Colombia to take over a family manufacturing plant, only to realize their new home is haunted.
The Purge: Anarchy (2014) http://180upload.com/mw2w8qkeplhd http://ia.media-imdb.com/images/M/MV5BMjE2ODMxMTk1Nl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMDEzNjEzMTE@._V1_SX500_SY999_.jpg? http://i.ytimg.com/vi/Yaoh3PqHG7I/maxresdefault.jpg Three groups of people are trying to survive Purge Night, when their stories intertwine and are left stranded in The Purge trying to survive the chaos and violence that occurs.
The Woman in Black 2: Angel of Death (2014) http://180upload.com/bndh6s26arxx http://cdn2-www.comingsoon.net/assets/uploads/2014/12/woman_in_black_angel_of_death_ver5_xlg1.jpg http://i.ytimg.com/vi/RHEn-NCNSeE/hqdefault.jpg 40 years after the first haunting at Eel Marsh House, a group of children evacuated from WWII London arrive, awakening the house's darkest inhabitant.
13 Sins (2014) http://180upload.com/4wy88jua3j2z http://ia.media-imdb.com/images/M/MV5BNzA0NDIwNjI3OF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMDMzNzE0MTE@._V1_SX500_SY999_.jpg? http://i.ytimg.com/vi/NhYaAaWfWBM/maxresdefault.jpg A cryptic phone call sets off a dangerous game of risks for Elliot, a down-on-his luck salesman. The game promises increasing rewards for completing 13 tasks, each more sinister than the last.
Horns (2013) http://180upload.com/dorg2kk2y93b http://ia.media-imdb.com/images/M/MV5BMTUxMDg2MDMyN15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNDY1Mjg0MjE@._V1_SX500_SY999_.jpg? http://horrornews.net/wp-content/uploads/2014/10/Daniel-Radcliffe-Horns2.jpg In the aftermath of his girlfriend's mysterious death, a young man awakens to find strange horns sprouting from his temples.
We Are What We Are (2013) http://180upload.com/58slug7plj6g http://i60.fastpic.ru/big/2013/1021/47/f1b7c328522cbb077059d3b0c6e85547.jpg http://www.openlettersmonthly.com/hammerandthump/wp-content/uploads/2013/10/We-Are-What-We-Are.jpg The Parkers, a reclusive family who follow ancient customs, find their secret existence threatened as a torrential downpour moves into their area, forcing daughters Iris and Rose to assume responsibilities beyond those of a typical family.
The Purge (2013) http://thefile.me/gz09d1zo33pb http://ia.media-imdb.com/images/M/MV5BMTU0OTE1Nzk2NF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMjE5NDY0OQ@@._V1_SX500_SY999_.jpg? https://zuts.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/the-purge-being-marched-upon.jpg In the future, a wealthy family is held hostage for harboring the target of a murderous syndicate during the Purge, a 12-hour period in which any and all crime is legalized.
The Human Race (2013) http://180upload.com/aj9mreedc5rj http://ia.media-imdb.com/images/M/MV5BMjMwODY2OTMxN15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNjQyNzE4MDE@._V1_SX500_SY999_.jpg? http://www.soundonsight.org/wp-content/uploads/2012/08/human-race-20121-2.jpg In THE HUMAN RACE a group of 80 people are ripped out of their daily lives and all re-appear in an undisclosed location. These people are from all walks of life: young and old, athletic and disabled, white-collared and homeless. The rules to a race boom in their heads, in their own voice and language, laying out what will become a horrific race of terror: 'If you are lapped twice, you die. If you step off the path, you die. If you touch the grass, you will die. Race... or die.'
Piranha 3DD (2012) http://movreel.com/x88fuqp3a7jp http://ia.media-imdb.com/images/M/MV5BMjAzMzY4NTk0M15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMDA4ODU3Nw@@._V1_SX500_SY999_.jpg? http://moviestorrents.net/wp-content/uploads/2013/04/Piranha-3DD-2012.png After the events at Lake Victoria, the pre-historic school of blood-thirsty piranhas make their way into a newly opened waterpark.
Final Destination 5 (2011) http://bestreams.net/a4823nsfhc60 http://ia.media-imdb.com/images/M/MV5BMTgyOTExNDc1M15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMDA0MTA4NQ@@._V1_SX500_SY999_.jpg? http://images4.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20110829095006/finaldestination/images/9/9f/Final_Destination_5_image-13_The_Bridge_collapse.jpg Survivors of a suspension-bridge collapse learn there's no way you can cheat Death.
The Roommate (2011) http://gorillavid.in/08rdmea72n91 http://ia.media-imdb.com/images/M/MV5BMjIwMzQwMzMwNF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNjE5MTUxNA@@._V1_SX500_SY999_.jpg? http://www.whitegadget.com/attachments/pc-wallpapers/71256d1314246888-roommate-roommate-pictures.jpg College student Sara finds that her new roommate Rebecca has an obsession with her, which quickly turns violent.
The Wolfman (2010) http://180upload.com/biibrkuihwqq http://ia.media-imdb.com/images/M/MV5BOTUyODEyMDIyM15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNTYxMzg5Mg@@._V1_SX500_SY999_.jpg? http://static.comicvine.com/uploads/original/7/74798/1560568-w.jpg Upon his return to his ancestral homeland, an American man is bitten, and subsequently cursed by, a werewolf.
The Ward (2010) http://180upload.com/case5q2dx6i2 http://ia.media-imdb.com/images/M/MV5BMTcxMDAzOTgxNl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNDQ5NTEzNA@@._V1_SX500_SY999_.jpg? http://image.tmdb.org/t/p/original/ydSloCzkMF1dSmFmrYS8wlM6rWW.jpg A thriller centered on an institutionalized young woman who becomes terrorized by a ghost.
My Soul to Take (2010) http://movreel.com/mjnmrqmjf4bi http://ia.media-imdb.com/images/M/MV5BMTk4NjE1OTg1MV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNTgwOTU3Mw@@._V1_SX500_SY999_.jpg? http://kindertrauma.com/images/art/mysoultotake4.jpg A serial killer returns to his hometown to stalk seven children who share the same birthday as the date he was allegedly put to rest.
The Anniversary at Shallow Creek (2010) http://movreel.com/blski21tay58 http://ia.media-imdb.com/images/M/MV5BMTk1NzIwMjEzMl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNzA0NTQwNA@@._V1_SX500_SY999_.jpg? http://www.moviemartyr.com/images/2010anniveraryatshallow01.jpg Six best friends find themselves at the wrong place at the wrong time. They fight for their lives against a serial killer who has more in store for them than death.
Fear (1996) http://vidto.me/pb2vxa3wwafr http://i600.photobucket.com/albums/tt89/bibby1483/Memorabilia/Celebrity%20and%20Entertainment%20Memorabilia/MarkWahlbergFearAutographed8x10.jpg https://thenypost.files.wordpress.com/2013/10/nothingtofear.jpg When Nicole met David; handsome, charming, affectionate, he was everything. It seemed perfect, but soon she sees that David has a darker side. And his adoration turns to obsession, their dream into a nightmare, and her love into fear.
